title: Justin Bieber's new wife Hailey gushes over his 'bomb a**' sandwich'
text:
He's just enjoyed a lavish star-studded wedding with his stunning other half, Hailey.

But after being attended to, Justin Bieber, 25, proved thankful as he was seen bringing a sandwich to his assistant in Beverly Hills on Friday.

The Sorry hitmaker went shirtless and barefoot as he emerged with the yummy treat, which he dubbed a 'bomb a** sandwich' - and he even had his stunning new wife, 22, vouching for his culinary skills.

Yummy treat: After being attended to during her recent nuptials, Justin Bieber proved thankful as he was seen bringing a sandwich to his assistant in Beverly Hills on Friday

'Bomb a** sandwich': The hitmaker proved very proud with his culinary special

Showing off his inked torso as he stepped out in light-coloured shorts, Justin was seen proudly holding a plate of food.

Clearly pleased with himself at his culinary efforts, Justin also shared the snaps on Instagram in black and white.

He captioned it: 'Photos showing me bring a bomb a** sandwich that I made for my assistant SANTI. Check my story for a play by play.'

Blonde bombshell Hailey was quick to leave a comment to back him up, sating: 'Not gonna lie... one of the best sandwiches I’ve ever had #GetYouAHusbandWhoMakesABombSandwhich.'

'Get you a husband...': Justin even had his stunning new wife, 22, vouching for his culinary skills

'One of the best sandwiched I've ever had!' Blonde bombshell Hailey was quick to leave a comment to back him up

Humble: The Sorry hitmaker went shirtless and barefoot as he emerged with the yummy treat, which he dubbed a 'bomb a** sandwich'

Justin and Hailey are singing each other's praises after getting married for the second time in South Carolina's Montage Palmetto Bluffs in New York.

The star-studded guest list included some Jenners, some Baldwins and Justin's controversial manager Scooter Braun.

The not-so-newlyweds, who first tied the knot over a year ago, kicked off the night by exchanging vows in a chapel in front of a legion of celebrity guests.

As pictures of the day leaked through across the evening, the happy couple eventually shared solo portraits which displayed the blingy elements.

Hailey perfectly matched her $500,000 engagement ring with a diamond wave shape band, believed to have come from Tiffany & Co.

Clearly pleased with himself at his culinary efforts, Justin also shared the snaps on Instagram in black and white

Smitten: Justin and Hailey are singing each other's praises after getting married for the second time in South Carolina's Montage Palmetto Bluffs in New York

The Vogue model was also seen wearing a large pair of platinum-set studs from the designer jewelry brand that were over five carats and worth over $123,000.

Justin meanwhile opted for a more simple look than his blinged-up bride as he donned a band of a thicker design on his wedding ring finger.

But that wasn't the only piece of jewelry for the Sorry pop star, rocking his Israeli diamond $25,000 lavender grillz.

Justin showcased his new accessory on social media last week and it is estimated to be worth $25,000, according to TMZ.

The singer also accessorized with his new $100,000 Audemars Piguet watch that he splurged on just days before the big day. 'Got myself a lil wedding gift,' he captioned at the time.

Since their wedding, the happy couple have appeared in Justin and Dan + Shay's video for 10,000 Hours, as well as a sexy campaign for Calvin Klein.
